svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: Shown is the female employment-to-population ratio in 2015 (horizontal axis) and in 1980 (vertical axis). The female
employment-to-population ratio corresponds to the proportion of a country's female population 15+ that is employed.
All figures correspond to national estimates, without ILO corrections (see limitations and exceptions in the sources).
